full_summary:
### Defence Intelligence Enterprise Support Services
#### Request for Supply Arrangement

**Reference:** PW_KIN_655_8682

**Publication Date:** August 10, 2022

**Closing Date:** March 31, 2026, 2:00 PM

#### Background

The Department of National Defence requires a supply arrangement to deliver information technology solutions to support the Defence Intelligence Enterprise's ongoing business evolution.

#### Scope of Work

The scope of work includes the provision of Turnkey High-Assurance On-Premises Information Technology Solutions and ongoing in-service support to various Defence Intelligence Enterprise initiatives throughout the initiative development cycle.

#### Selection Criteria

Suppliers must demonstrate their ability to deliver high-assurance IT solutions and provide in-service support. Qualified suppliers will be pre-qualified to receive Requests for Proposals for requirements related to this supply arrangement.

#### Conditions of Tender

* Suppliers must submit bids electronically using the Canada Post epost Connect application.
* Faxed and hard copy bids will not be accepted.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

#### Evaluation Criteria

The Canada will evaluate bids based on supplier qualifications, experience, and financial capacity.

#### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

#### Contact Information

Patrick Semple
Project Manager
9th Floor, East Block
100 Wellington Street
Ottawa, ON K1A 0A2
613-549-3112

Please note that this requirement has a security requirement.

#### Attachments

A copy of the solicitation document is available on the [Canada Buys] (+ CANADA BUYS+) website.

THE CROWN RETAINS THE RIGHT TO NEGOTIATE WITH SUPPLIERS ON ANY PROCUREMENT. Released By [Minister of Public Works and Government Services Canada] Authorized By [Authorized Person]. Signing date: 2022-08-08. Signature Name And Title: Trina LeGris Assistant Deputy Minister. Signature Date: 2022-08-08.

### Examination Yes No
